item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants and events in Providence.

This week's location is: Hot Club

A perennial Collective favorite, the Hot Club is the perfect summer spot.  It sits at the head of the Narragansett Bay, on the water of Providence Harbor, just north of the Fox Point hurricane barrier. The evening views of the Providence River Bridge and the Manchester Street Power Station are some of the best in the city.

This location was selected because of it's proximity to Monday night's 4th of July fireworks display by the city of Providence, which will begin at 9pm at India Point Park.  So swing by for some good times with a few friends, and then walk over to India Point Park for a fantastic pyrotechnic display.  Together, a great way to end a holiday weekend.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Meetup. Ever. ***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be outside on the deck. Look for Stephanie, she'll be hosting the meetup.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Hot Club
